meanings.definition: A variegated chalcedony showing curved, colored bands or other markings.
meanings.sent1: The agate had beautiful swirls of different colors.
meanings.sent2: She collected agates from the beach to make jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The agate rolled away, leaving a trail of colors behind.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like agate in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The agate looked like a tiny, colorful planet in her hand.

meanings.definition: A playing marble made of this substance.
meanings.sent1: He won a shiny agate in the marble game.
meanings.sent2: Kids used agates to play games on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The agate jumped into the circle, eager to join the game.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed like the rolling of agates on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The agate gleamed like a precious gem among the marbles.
